acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Special Collections purchased the "The Confederacy" Performance Program in July 2011.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the "The Confederacy" Performance Program was completed in November 2011.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: "The Confederacy" opened on July 1, 1958 at the Robert E. Lee Amphitheater in Virginia Beach, Va. The play, based on the life of Robert E. Lee, ran till the summer of 1959.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of one program from the performance "The Confederacy"--a play "based on the life of Robert E. Lee." Samuel Selden and The Tidewater Historic Drama Association are listed as director and producers, respectively. The program further details the play, cast and staff.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.
